CustomField.description: **System Calculated Field** Automatically sets the default greeting for the household based upon the selected value in the Household Default Greeting Type picklist.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(DonorApi__Household_Default_Greeting_Type__c,"Household Informal Greeting"), DonorApi__Household_Informal_Greeting__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(DonorApi__Household_Default_Greeting_Type__c,"Household Formal Greeting"), DonorApi__Household_Formal_Greeting__c, DonorApi__Household_Informal_Greeting__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated Field** Automatically sets the default greeting for the household based upon the selected value in the Household Default Greeting Type picklist.
CustomField.label: Household Default Greeting
